thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: Morky
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Morky

author: Morky
title: Morky
text: Harvey Norman mixed up two orders and I received wrong item which I returned upon receipt of return label. I expected immediate delivery of my order but was inconvenienced by Harvey Norman waiting for items to be returned before completing my order. The customer service person said it was their policy - even if it was their fault. BAD POLICY.
